edu.iu.dsc.tws.api.compute

Interface TaskContext

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TaskContextImpl

    public interface TaskContext
    TaskContext is passed to the task instances when they are being prepared to execute. This class is used for getting information about the task as well as sending messages.

      • getInEdges

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Set<java.lang.String>> getInEdges()
        Get the in edges of the task. Generally, each edge would have a single source. But, the join edges have multiple sources. These will be reflected by the Set.
        Returns:
        a map with edge name -> Set of source task names for that edge
